Consequent upon the discussions held in Variation Committee Meeting held on 25.07.08 'and with the approval of the competent authority, the following decisions are conveyed for strict compliance: (a) Procedure for . payment- under Change of Scope Orders in case of BOT Projects The Change of Scope Orders under BOT (Tolll Annuity) Projects should be treated similar to the work   under EPC Contracts. Independent Consultant and Project Director are required fo record and test check the measurements as per the guidelines on record of the measurements. (b) Recovery of 20% of value of work not completed upon termination of Contract on account of default of the Contractor as per Sub-CI 63.3 of COPA under NHDP Phase-II Standard Document: As per Standard Civil Work Bid Document; Sub-clause 63.3 of COPA read with Appendix to Bid, in case of termination of Contract on account of default of the Contractor, a recovery of 20% of the value of work not completed at BOQ rates plus the variations already approved by the Engineer and cost of remedying of any defects in the works executed by the Contractor has been specified: In this connection, it is to be noted that BOQ rates in such cases shall include price escalation as per last IPC to the Contractor before   termination (e.g: if escalation is 15% as per last IPC before termination, BOQ rates are to be multiplied by 1.15 to arrive at the value of work not corpleted):  This shall be ensured in the contracts having similar provisions other than NHDP Phase- Il also. 'Contract Management Cell may examine the Clause in Standard Document on above  matter_and amplify the clause for  clarityl use in future contract documents. (V.K.
